name: Libplay
body:
# LibPlay

A sane multimedia library.

Dependencies
------------

Required:
* GLib >= 2.44, https://developer.gnome.org/glib
* GStreamer >= 1.8, https://gstreamer.freedesktop.org/

Optional:
* Lua >= 5.2, http://www.lua.org
